Reference: { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }

 

Dear { Value /UnderwritingCase/RiskInformation/PrimaryProducer/Client/CompleteClientName }

 

The policy application processed by you identified with the number  { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }, has been passed to our risk assessment department. Once we have the results of the evaluation we will tell you.

 

Again, thank you for choosing us. 

 

Seguros Internacionales C.A.

Referencia: { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }

 

Estimado { Value /UnderwritingCase/RiskInformation/PrimaryProducer/Client/CompleteClientName }

 

La solicitud de póliza procesada por usted identificada con el número  { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }, ha sido pasada a nuestro departamento de evaluación de riesgos. En cuanto tengamos el resultado de la evaluación se lo haremos saber.

 

Una vez más, gracias por preferirnos. 

 

Atentamente,

Seguros Internacionales C.A.
Application has been passed to the review committee.
Solicitud pasada a comité de revisión.

Seguros Internacionales C.A.

Referencia: { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }

icd:LocalizedString.Value: Recuperar póliza { Value /RiskInformation/Policy/PolicyID } Caso { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }
Recuperar póliza { Value /RiskInformation/Policy/PolicyID } Caso { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }{ Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }
Recuperar póliza { Value /RiskInformation/Policy/PolicyID } Caso { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }
Recuperar póliza { Value /RiskInformation/Policy/PolicyID } Caso { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }{ Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }

Reference: { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }

 

Dear { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/FirstName } { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/LastName } { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/LastName2 } 

 

We have reviewed your application #  { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }, and we are pleased to inform you that we have decided to provide insurance.

 

Details of your policy.

 Product{ Value /ProductMaster/Description }

 

Policy#               { Value /RiskInformation/Policy/PolicyID }

Effective date   { Value /RiskInformation/Policy/EffectiveDate }  Expiration date { Value /RiskInformation/Policy/EndingDate }

Sum Insured      { Value /UnderwritingCase/FaceAmount }

Annual premium { Value /RiskInformation/TotalOriginalAnnualPremium }

 

We appreciate to contact the insurance company to formalize the contract. 

 

Thank you,

Seguros Internacionales C.A.

Referencia: { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }

 

Estimado Sr./Sra: { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/FirstName } { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/LastName } { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/LastName2 } 

 

Hemos examinado con atención su solicitud #  { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }, y nos es  grato informarle que hemos decidido conceder el seguro.

 

Detalles de su póliza.

 Plan { Value /ProductMaster/Description }

 

Póliza #              { Value /RiskInformation/Policy/PolicyID }

Vigencia             Desde { Value /EffectiveDateFormat } Hasta { Value /EndingDateFormat }

Suma asegurada { Value /UnderwritingCase/FaceAmount }

Prima anual        { Value /RiskInformation/TotalOriginalAnnualPremium }

 

Agradecemos ponerse en contacto con la empresa de seguros a fin de formalizar el contrato.

 

 

Atentamente,

Seguros Internacionales C.A.
Acceptance of the application. Policy generated. Contact Us.
Aceptación de la solicitud. Póliza generada. Contáctenos.

Referencia: { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }

 

Dear { Value /UnderwritingCase/RiskInformation/PrimaryProducer/Client/CompleteClientName }

 

We have processed the application for a policy filed by you and the policy has been registered in our system (Policy No. { Value /RiskInformation/Policy/PolicyID })

 

Thank you,

Seguros Internacionales C.A.

Referencia: { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }

 

Estimado { Value /UnderwritingCase/RiskInformation/PrimaryProducer/Client/CompleteClientName }

 

Hemos procesado la solicitud de póliza tramitada por usted y la póliza ha sido registrada en nuestro sistema (Póliza número { Value /RiskInformation/Policy/PolicyID })

 

Atentamente

Seguros Internacionales C.A.
Quote processed. { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }
Cotización procesada. { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }

Reference: { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }

 

Dear { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/FirstName } { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/LastName } { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/LastName2 }   

 

 

We have carefully analyzed your request #  { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }, and we regret to inform you that we have decided to decline your case, for the following reason::

 

"The risk classification is not appropriate for the insurance applied”

Point: { Value /Puntos }

Risk classification: { Value /UnderwritingCase/RiskClassification }

 

 

Thank you,

Seguros Internacionales C.A.

Referencia: { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }

 

Estimado Sr./Sra. { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/FirstName } { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/LastName } { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/LastName2 }  

 

 

Hemos examinado con atención su solicitud #  { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }, y lamentamos informarle que hemos decidido declinar su caso, por la siguiente razón:

 

"La clasificación de riesgo no es apropiada para el seguro solicitado”

Puntos: { Value /Puntos }

Clasificación: { Value /UnderwritingCase/RiskClassification }

 

 

Atentamente,

Seguros Internacionales C.A.
Quote declined
Cotización declinada

Reference: { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }

 

Dear Sir or Madam: { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/FirstName } { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/LastName } { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/LastName2 } 

 

He have carefully examined your insurance application #  { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }, and we are pleased to inform you that we have decided to grant you the insurance. Soon we will be sending the details of your correspondence by mail.

 

 

Kindest regards,

International Insurance, INC.

Referencia: { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }

 

Estimado Sr./Sra: { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/FirstName } { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/LastName } { Value /RiskInformation/PrimaryInsured/Client/LastName2 }  

 

Hemos examinado con atención su solicitud #  { Value /UnderwritingCase/UnderwritingCaseID }, y nos es  grato informarle que hemos decidido conceder el seguro. Próximamente le enviaremos correspondencia con los detalles de su póliza.

 

 

Atentamente,

Seguros Internacionales C.A.
Acceptance of the application.
Aceptación de la solicitud
